mapper.select: select distinct stock_code as code, stock_name as name from stock_rt_info where stock_code like concat('%',#{searchStr},'%')

select sri.trade_amount tradeAmt, sri.pre_close_price preClosePrice, (sri.max_price - sri.min_price) / sri.pre_close_price amplitude, sri.stock_code code, sri.stock_name name, sri.cur_time curDate, sri.trade_volume tradeVol, (sri.cur_price - sri.pre_close_price) upDown, (sri.cur_price - sri.pre_close_price) / sri.pre_close_price increase, sri.cur_price tradePrice from stock_rt_info sri where sri.cur_time = #{date} order by upDown desc

select t2.tle title, count(*) count from (select case when t.rate < -0.07 then '<-7%' when t.rate >= -0.07 and t.rate < -0.05 then '-7~-5%' when t.rate >= -0.05 and t.rate < -0.03 then '-5~-3%' when t.rate >= -0.03 and t.rate < 0 then '-3~0%' when t.rate >= 0 and t.rate < 0.03 then '0~3%' when t.rate >= 0.03 and t.rate < 0.05 then '3~5%' when t.rate >= 0.05 and t.rate < 0.07 then '5%~7%' else '>7%' end 'tle' from (select (sr.cur_price - sr.pre_close_price) / sr.pre_close_price rate from stock_rt_info sr where cur_time = #{date}) t) t2 group by t2.tle;

select sri.cur_time as date, sri.trade_amount as tradeAmt, sri.stock_code as code, sri.min_price lowPrice, sri.pre_close_price as preClosePrice, sri.stock_name as name, sri.max_price as highPrice, sri.open_price as openPrice, sri.trade_volume as tradeVol, sri.cur_price as tradePrice from stock_rt_info as sri where sri.stock_code = #{code} and sri.cur_time between #{starDate} and #{endDate};

select s.cur_time date , s.trade_amount tradeAmt, s.stock_code code, s.min_price lowPrice, s.stock_name name, s.max_price highPrice, s.open_price openPrice, s.trade_volume tradeVol, s.cur_price closePrice, s.pre_close_price preClosePrice from stock_rt_info s where s.stock_code = #{code} and s.cur_time in (select max(sri.cur_time) time from stock_rt_info sri where sri.stock_code = #{code} and sri.cur_time between #{starDate} and #{endDate} group by date_format(sri.cur_time, '%Y%m%d')) order by s.cur_time;

select s3.*,s4.cur_price closePrice from (select s1.avgPrice, s1.minPrice, s1.maxPrice, s1.mxTime, s1.stockCode, s2.open_price openPrice from (select avg(sr.cur_price) avgPrice, min(sr.min_price) minPrice, max(sr.max_price) maxPrice, max(sr.cur_time) mxTime, sr.stock_code stockCode, min(sr.cur_time) minTime from stock_rt_info sr WHERE sr.stock_code = #{code} AND sr.cur_time BETWEEN #{starDate} and #{endDate} group by DATE_FORMAT(sr.cur_time, '%Y%U')) s1 left join stock_rt_info s2 on s1.stockCode = s2.stock_code and s1.minTime = s2.cur_time) s3 left join stock_rt_info s4 on s3.stockCode = s4.stock_code and s3.mxTime = s4.cur_time;

select s3.stockCode, s3.avgPrice, s3.closeTime as MxTime, s3.maxPrice, s3.minPrice, s3.openPrice, sri3.cur_price as closePrice from (select s1.stockCode, s1.avgPrice, s1.closeTime, s1.maxPrice, s1.minPrice, sri2.open_price as openPrice from (select stock_code as stockCode, max(max_price) as maxPrice, min(min_price) as minPrice, avg(cur_price) as avgPrice, MIN(cur_time) as openTime, max(cur_time) as closeTime from stock_rt_info sri where stock_code = #{code} and sri.cur_time between #{starDate} and #{endDate} group by DATE_FORMAT(sri.cur_time,'%Y%U')) s1 left join stock_rt_info sri2 on sri2.cur_time = s1.openTime and sri2.stock_code =s1.stockCode) s3 left join stock_rt_info sri3 on sri3.cur_time = s3.closeTime and s3.stockCode =sri3.stock_code;

select pre_close_price as preClosePrice, open_price as openPrice, cur_price as tradePrice, max_price as highPrice, min_price as lowPrice, trade_volume as tradeVol, trade_amount as tradeAmt, cur_time as curDate from stock_rt_info sri where stock_code = #{code} and cur_time = #{lastDate}

select cur_time as date , trade_amount as tradeAmt, trade_volume as tradeVol, (trade_volume/trade_amount) as tradePrice from stock_rt_info sri where stock_code = #{code} order by cur_time desc limit #{limitNum}

SELECT sri2.cur_time AS date, sri2.stock_code AS code, sri2.max_price AS highPrice, sri2.min_price AS lowPrice, sri2.stock_name AS name, sri2.open_price AS openPrice, sri2.pre_close_price AS preClosePrice, sri2.trade_volume AS tradeVol, sri2.trade_amount AS tradeAmt, sri2.cur_price AS closePrice FROM stock_rt_info AS sri2 WHERE sri2.stock_code = #{stockCode} AND sri2.cur_time IN ( SELECT MAX( sri.cur_time ) AS date FROM stock_rt_info AS sri WHERE sri.stock_code = #{stockCode} AND sri.cur_time BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( sri.cur_time, '%Y%m%d' )) ORDER BY date ASC
